subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Quincy Ford dribbled to his left off an inbounds play and connected as time expired, sending Northeastern to a 78-77 victory at No. 15 Miami on Friday.
snippet: Quincy Ford dribbled to his left off an inbounds play and connected as time expired, sending Northeastern to a 78-77 victory at No. 15 Miami on Friday.
